alert.note: Alert for Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 7:24PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana and southwestern Newton Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 724 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Devils Pocket, or 7 miles north of Deweyville, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deweyville and Devils Pocket. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
